name: 8 Hour RPG
description:
This is a simple RPG I made to play with the Godot game engine. It literally isn't a game, but I'm actually pretty impressed with what I could pump out in 8 hours after not using Godot for anything in almost a year.

I ran out of time to implement a combat system, or any systems that you'd normally associate with an RPG, but hey, I challenged myself to make something in 8 hours and I did.
